publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6133 Marilyn Livingstone: Fife Coastal Path is the Best in Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the dedication of the teams that manage and maintain the Fife Coastal Path; recognises that the path was named runner-up in the 2010 Joules Award for the UK’s Best Coastal Path and was the highest-rated Scottish coastal path; praises the Fife Coast and Countryside Trust for its hard work in ensuring that residents and visitors have access to a high quality experience of the coast, and acknowledges that the path is used by over half a million walkers each year and generates around £24 million for the Fife economy.
S3M-6133 Fife Coastal Path is the Best in Scotland (lodged on 13 April 2010) Dr Richard Simpson*, Sarah Boyack*, Hugh Henry*, David Whitton*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-6133 Fife Coastal Path is the Best in Scotland (lodged on 13 April 2010) John Park*, Trish Godman*

S3M-6133 Marilyn Livingstone: Fife Coastal Path is the Best in Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the dedication of the teams that manage and maintain the Fife Coastal Path; recognises that the path was named runner-up in the 2010 Joules Award for the UK’s Best Coastal Path and was the highest-rated Scottish coastal path; praises the Fife Coast and Countryside Trust for its hard work in ensuring that residents and visitors have access to a high quality experience of the coast, and acknowledges that the path is used by over half a million walkers each year and generates around £24 million for the Fife economy. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson, Sarah Boyack, Hugh Henry, David Whitton, Gil Paterson, John Park, Trish Godman
